title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Comprehensive certification covering HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript fundamentals, responsive design principles, and modern web development practices.

title: Python Programming for Web Development
description: Advanced Python certification focusing on web frameworks, REST API development, database integration, and backend architecture patterns.

title: Responsive Web Design Specialist
description: Specialized certification in creating responsive, mobile-first web designs using modern CSS techniques, Flexbox, Grid, and media queries.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
description: AWS certification demonstrating foundational knowledge of cloud computing concepts, AWS services, and cloud architecture best practices.

title: JavaScript Advanced Concepts
description: Advanced JavaScript certification covering ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, DOM manipulation, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
